q: In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey for a long time to come,'' Eric Schmidt said. Page praised Eric Schmidt , too. There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly, Page said.`` Eric Schmidt is a tremendous leader and I have learned innumerable lessons from him.'' The change in command overshadowed Google Inc. 's fourth-quarter earnings, which soared past analysts' estimates as

said Mike Pence has no plans to attend CPAC this year and has no comment about the GOProud controversy.`` At this time the congressman is focusing his attention on Indiana,'' Lloyd said. He hopes to participate in future CPAC opportunities as his schedule permits. The American Conservative Union, which started the conference, raised eyebrows among conservatives last year when it first allowed GOProud to be a co-sponsor. Those concerns have grown this year.

Among her reforms is legislation requiring all new state employees to enter 401( k)- style benefit plans. We want reforms in place before there's any discussion about tax increases, said Mimi Walters , the GOP's nominee in the fall for state treasurer who was trounced by incumbent Bill Lockyer .`` I do know there's not support at all to even put it on the ballot without significant pension

The Prime Minster went on to praise the manner in which Andy Coulson ran the Number 10 communication's team, saying it worked in a very proper and transparent and decent way; that hasn't always been the case in the past .

goals, but can't acquire a majority stake until its loans are repaid.`` There is no difference operationally'' between the two companies, said Sergio Marchionne who is CEO of both Fiat and Chrysler. From a corporate governance standpoint is the point in which separate companies don't make a lot of sense.... We're not there yet. Sergio Marchionne said`` I'm not Carlos Ghosn ,'' referring to the fact that Carlos Ghosn heads both Renault and Nissan- two automakers that have formed an alliance. `` I stand by what I've said about those events but when the spokesman needs a spokesman, it's time to move on,'' Andy Coulson said in a statement announcing his resignation. Unfortunately, continued coverage of events connected to my old job at the News of the World has made it difficult for me to give the 110 percent needed in this role, he added. The 43-year-old-- a key figure in David Cameron 's inner circle who helped propel the Conservative leader to power in elections in May 2010-- later left Downing Street without speaking to reporters.

veteran who had served as CEO of Novell and chief technology officer of Sun Microsystems, Eric Schmidt was brought in to provide some`` adult supervision.'' On his Twitter account on Thursday, Eric Schmidt wrote: Day-to-day adult supervision is no longer needed. `` I believe Larry is ready'' to take over as CEO, Eric Schmidt said during a call with analysts.`` It's time for him to have a shot at running this.''
